title: Cong Leaders Share Old Video From Prayagraj As Floods in Delhi
subtitle: Fact checking old video shared by Congress leaders as floods in Delhi while taking a dig at Arvind Kejriwal. The video is actually from Prayagraj in 2019.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The video is actually from Prayagraj, when it was flooded in September 2019.

A reverse image search led us to another tweet with the same video by one Awanish Sharan, where users had commented that it was from Prayagraj.
